acknowledgeActionRequests.Description: The list of acknowledge action requests. You can specify up to 10 requests per operation.

detectors.Description: The list of one or more detectors to be deleted.

disableActionRequests.Description: The list of disable action requests. You can specify up to 10 requests per operation.

enableActionRequests.Description: The list of enable action requests. You can specify up to 10 requests per operation.

messages.Description: The list of messages to send. Each message has the following format: '{ "messageId": "string", "inputName": "string", "payload": "string"}'

resetActionRequests.Description: The list of reset action requests. You can specify up to 10 requests per operation.

snoozeActionRequests.Description: The list of snooze action requests. You can specify up to 10 requests per operation.

detectors.Description: The list of detectors (instances) to update, along with the values to update.

alarmModelName.Description: The name of the alarm model.

keyValue.Description: The value of the key used as a filter to select only the alarms associated with the key .

detectorModelName.Description: The name of the detector model whose detectors (instances) you want information about.

keyValue.Description: A filter used to limit results to detectors (instances) created because of the given key ID.

alarmModelName.Description: The name of the alarm model.

nextToken.Description: The token that you can use to return the next set of results.

maxResults.Description: The maximum number of results to be returned per request.

detectorModelName.Description: The name of the detector model whose detectors (instances) are listed.

stateName.Description: A filter that limits results to those detectors (instances) in the given state.

nextToken.Description: The token that you can use to return the next set of results.

maxResults.Description: The maximum number of results to be returned per request.
